content: I don't possess intimate insights and expertise about advancements in the extraction of olive oil. however, it is likely that there will be advancements in the future as technology continues to improve. these advancements may focus on increasing the efficiency and sustainability of the extraction process, as well as improving the quality and flavor of the oil. it's possible that new methods and technologies will also be developed to minimize waste and reduce the environmental impact of olive oil production. as with any industry, innovation often leads to advancements that make production more streamlined, efficient, and ecologically sustainable in the long run.
